Text: hello guys, i am rather new to this hd dvd scene. I dowloaded Behind Enemy Lines blu ray etc, i got a few .avi files and .par2 files. i only get video on powerdvd ultra and on windows media, but no sound. how do i get the sound going? thanks a bunch fellas!
thanks for the reply hdtv china, i tried lookin in their site but i dont know where or what to look for specifically, i feel totally lost, can u pls point me to the right topic? much appreciated :)
Good stuff hdtv china, thanks a lot :)

i m using PIII with 650 Mhz processor with overclocking speed of 723Mhz. n 256 Mb Ram.

Shud i Able to play these 1080p movies in my comp.

if someone know plz lemme know any way if i can play these movies.

only one way,change your computer.
Recommended: INTEL Core2 DUO or AMD X2 4800+ and NVIDIA 8500GT

core2 duo (AT LEAST 2.4) and a freeking fast video card. Throw in  at least a gig  of memory. I have a 8800 gts and 3 gigs of memory and a lot of these releases dont work. Not recommened=  mandatory-srry

ABSOLUTELY works....you just have to do a little digging:

First, you need HDTVPump:

http://www.dvbportal.de/projects/hdtvpump/

And then (At least for any HD-DVD releases by HDTV_CHINA i have) you need Matroska Splitter

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/

You will also need to have a MPEG2 decoder previously installed. NVIDIA's works. If you can play a DVD - chances are you have a valid decoder.

Install those and report back!
I knew this would take a long time, but my (brand new) computer seems to think it's going to take 250 days to download! That is just ridiculus! Come on seed people!

Looks really good :)

You can also play it with KMplayer...
please seed some more. it will take ages. :)
